title: Crouwel's New Alphabet Help
content:
I'm trying to decipher the glyphs of Crouwel's New Alphabet and I'm having some trouble with the punctuation. Can anyone identify the glyphs in the bottom row of this sample?   
   
 ![Crouwel New Alphabet](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018022504im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/17773.jpg)   
   
I also can't discover if the glyphs in the sample I've found are the whole set. Does anyone know? Does anyone have a more complete sample?   
   
Update: I should have done a more thorough search before posting here since I missed an [existing thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018022504/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/4100/2016.html?1029189208)
author: Aaron Sittig

comments.content:
Aaron, there are four glyphs missing from your bottom row.   
They look like a conventional
